_Comment._Name: Just a Reference to the old system naming. Changing does nothing.
_Comment._Lay Item: Item the chicken will Lay.               modid:itemid:metadata:amount #example: minecraft:log:2:3
_Comment._Drop Item: Item the chicken drops on death.        modid:itemid:metadata:amount #example: minecraft:bone
_Comment._Spawn Type: Chicken spawn type, can be: NORMAL,SNOW,NONE,HELL
_Comment._Parent 1: First parent, empty if it cant be breed. modid:chickenid #example: chickens:waterchicken
_Comment._Parent 2: Second parent, empty if it cant be breed.
